alert.note: Alert for Marion; St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 07 at 9:38AM EDT until April 07 at 10:15AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM EDT FOR WESTERN FLAGLER...SOUTH CENTRAL ST. JOHNS...NORTHEASTERN MARION AND SOUTHEASTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES... At 938 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fruitland, or near Pomona Park, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crescent City, Pomona Park, Salt Springs, Andalusia, Lake Delancy, Fruitland, Satsuma, Welaka, Espanola and Lake Como. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
